messages.subject: Problems with cloning
messages.msgSnippet: I haven t given much thought to the morality of cloning, although I think it will open a can of worms we aren t prepared to deal with.  I STRONGLY feel that we
messages.messageBody:
I haven't given much thought to the morality of cloning, although I think it
will open a can of worms we aren't prepared to deal with. I STRONGLY feel
that we know way too little to be thinking about cloning humans.

When the issue came up I remembered having heard and/or read some articles
which reported early deaths, high rates of miscarriage and early disease in
cloned animals.

I did a very short google on the subject and came up with a web site
containing some articles on the issue.

http://www.newscientist.com/hottopics/cloning/

This is an article on resulting problems in some clones:
http://www.newscientist.com/hottopics/cloning/cloning.jsp?id=ns99991903


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
